[[Image:Seal of the United States Supreme Court.svg|150px|right]]
The 2012 term of the [[Supreme Court of the United States]] began October 1, 2012 and concluded October 6, 2013.  The table illustrates which opinion was filed by each justice in each case and which justices joined each opinion. For a brief description of the central holding in each case, see the [[List_of_United_States_Supreme_Court_cases_by_the_Roberts_Court#2012_term|list of cases decided by the Roberts court]] during the 2012 term.
